name: Geese Mythology
description:
GEESE MYTHOLOGY - voveo studios

Evoke aspects of different myths to conquer all glory seekers! Test out different combinations to find potent synergies. 

Will you be taken down?

controls: WASD to move, Q and E to use skills, mouse right button to shoot.

hint: try chimera and minotaur's skills together\

by voveo studios for the GMTK 2022 game jam, made in 48 hours
